David Hasenwich

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Hansenwick
  2. Foster Name: David L.
  3. Foster Family: Martin Joseph and Elizabeth G. Schafer
  4. Location of Family: Auburn, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Auburn, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 4
  8. Date of Birth: 10/11/1910, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 3/19/2004, Lincoln, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Blanche Schafer
  12. Source: David Schafer obituary, Lincoln Journal Star (NE), 21 March 2004; 1920 United States Federal Census; Nemaha County Herald (Auburn, NE), 5 February 1915; George Round, "Remember When?" newspaper column, September 1983.
